title: Activists Starboard, Elliott Have Taken Stakes in Willis Towers Watson
sub_head: Moves come as insurance broker seeks to rebound from collapse of its planned merger with Aon PLC
body:
Activist investors including Starboard Value LP and Elliott Management Corp. have taken stakes in Willis Towers Watson PLC, according to people familiar with the matter, the insurance broker aiming to rebound from the collapse of its planned merger with Aon PLC.
The activists’ presence underscores the pressure Willis Towers’s incoming chief executive is under to carry out his plan to improve its results as a stand-alone company.
